comments.body: I know it was there before but it's a good chance to fix the style (one argument per line)
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -41,10 +41,10 @@ case object KafkaWriterCommitMessage extends WriterCommitMessage
  * @param schema The schema of the input data.
  */
 class KafkaStreamingWriteSupport(
-    topic: Option[String], producerParams: Map[String, String], schema: StructType)
+    topic: Option[String], producerParams: ju.Map[String, Object], schema: StructType)

@@ -41,10 +41,10 @@ case object KafkaWriterCommitMessage extends WriterCommitMessage
  * @param schema The schema of the input data.
  */
 class KafkaStreamingWriteSupport(
-    topic: Option[String], producerParams: Map[String, String], schema: StructType)
+    topic: Option[String], producerParams: ju.Map[String, Object], schema: StructType)
